text: WJJX is a Contemporary Hit Radio formatted broadcast radio station licensed to Appomattox, Virginia, serving Lynchburg, Virginia and the Southside. WJJX is owned and operated by iHeartMedia ==References== ==External links== *JJS Online * Category:1990 establishments in Virginia Category:Rhythmic contemporary radio stations in the United States Category:Radio stations established in 1990 JJX Category:IHeartMedia radio stations
title: WJJX
